website_summaries.verdict: A well-made portable changing pad that offers a great mix of fashion and function.
pros: Polyester PVC pad can be cleaned in a washing machine for added convenience
Compact design makes the pad a perfect choice for storing in a car, diaper bag, or purse
Offers lots of room for your baby
More affordable than many comparable pads
cons: Low-quality fabric leaves much to be desired
Not as soft as other pads

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof
customer_reviews.text: This changing pad is not 100% liquid proof. The material is porous thus defeating the purpose of this changing pad. The whole idea is to be able to wipe any accidents off easily and not have to worry about urine or poop soaking in to the fabric. Not to mention it feels very cheap and I highly doubt it would hold up to multiple washes in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Rozalin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this changing pad! Wish it wasn’t white on the changing side though just to cover some unpleasant stains. Other than that it’s so nice and bigger than the one that came with my diaper bag we switched it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: Been using it everyday and it’s been one of my must buy essentials
customer_reviews.author: sdallas

customer_reviews.title: Good Extra Changing Pad
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to keep at grandma's house. It's been good for that, but i prefer a wider pad for diaper changes on the run. My baby has always been big, and he sometimes wiggles off the pad during changes.
customer_reviews.author: Morrigan

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but ripped and stained quickly
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking changing pad but seam is already coming apart and inside is stained within weeks. The inside/changing surface should be easily cleaned, but after getting a poop stain on once it won't come out of white nonwipable surface!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This changing pad is perfect for my infant and it fits great in my diaper bag. It's easy to clean and durable so far. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Stains easliy
customer_reviews.text: Used for 1 week already stained, and is not very wide. Would not buy again...other changing pads we have don't stain like this one has.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This product is ok does what it supposed to. It could be longer in length to grow with baby but I'm ok with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cardero Cobbs and Roshanda Green

customer_reviews.title: Cute and basic
customer_reviews.text: Good durable material. Simple wipe to clean. Nice pattern and fits the diaper bag. Good buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian & Amber M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the car!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Exactly what I was looking for. Bought this baby diaper changing pad to keep in the car for when we are on the go. Just the right size to keep in the car door pocket. Keeps my baby and my car clean. Good quality at a great price. I highly recommend buying!
customer_reviews.author: tskinny

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for our household when the grand babies come over
customer_reviews.author: mary susan king

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing has held up for 11 months now. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Tweek43110

customer_reviews.title: Stained Easily
customer_reviews.text: Overall we want to like this product, but the lining stained easily. We tried washing it (as it is machine washable), but this did nothing to remove the stain and it made the changing pad wrinkly and got ride of the folding lines, making it difficult to travel with compactly.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Workman

customer_reviews.title: Great product! it was exactly what we have been ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! it was exactly what we have been looking for. This changing pad is not to small and not to big its the perfect size. It can fit in your car door or whichever diaper bag you choose to use. We are very pleased, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It is light and does its job !
customer_reviews.author: nathalie

customer_reviews.title: so it was great to find
customer_reviews.text: This print was the closest to the one we had lost, so it was great to find. The pad it self is just a little small, width and length. It's more for new borns and as you know babies stay in diapers til 2- 21/2 if not longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Handy item to have around the house. As a grandmother and great aunt, I'm blessed to have little babies around my house from time to time. With this changing pad it's quick and easy to set up to change a diaper.
customer_reviews.author: Lori B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: It is light weight and easy to open and close with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Aisla

customer_reviews.title: Small size
customer_reviews.text: Was planning on using this for whenver baby needs a change but it’s small size makes it a little useless
customer_reviews.author: andrea amaris

customer_reviews.title: Compact and perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Doesn't take up a bunch of room so I can fit it in my purse or door of my car and it still gets the job done. This has become my go to for when Im out and about.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Vert convenient, very well made changing pad. My diaper bag didn't come with one so I bought this one. Its stylish also.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Agbasi

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It is not same the picture, it is too much small Maybe for not more one month old baby
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Cushioned
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to try this with my baby. It looks promising . Feels very nice
customer_reviews.author: Dulce

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does its job! Wish it was a little bit broader..
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Love that it can be wiped clean easily and stores ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Love that it can be wiped clean easily and stores great in a diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Bought it as gift and it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Bought it as gift and it was very well received. If a need arises I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jacolyn Butler

customer_reviews.title: ... the changing pad about a week ago and I love it! It's perfectly sized to fit in your ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got the changing pad about a week ago and I love it! It's perfectly sized to fit in your purse and take it anywhere you go. It's small but it does the job. I would totally recommend this to anybody that's looking for something small and discreet that's not bulky and get stored in your purse. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Padilla

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty small, not sure how much use I'll get ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty small , not sure how much use I'll get out of it
customer_reviews.author: Erendira Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my grandchild.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and nice looking. Has held up well. Used in her travel bag for changes while away from home.
customer_reviews.author: ZonShopper
